peel.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: to remove the skin from fruit or vegetables
peel.translation[0].definitions[1].defin: if skin, paper, or paint peels, it comes off, usually in small pieces
peel.translation[0].definitions[1].examp: The paper was peeling from the wall.
New skin grows, and the damaged skin peels off.
peel.translation[0].definitions[2].defin: to lose an outer layer or surface
peel.translation[0].definitions[2].examp: The walls were peeling from the damp.
peel.translation[0].definitions[3].defin: to remove the outer layer from something
peel.translation[0].definitions[3].examp: Peel away the waxed paper from the bottom of the cake.
peel.translation[1].definitions[0].defin: the skin of some fruits and vegetables, especially the thick skin of fruits such as oranges, which you do not eat
